title: Fugue
description: Life is falling into place for Lia—a great guy and a start to a new, happy life. Until she wakes up in a psychiatric ward, with a husband she doesn’t remember and a name, Karen, that she’s never heard in her life.Karen can’t remember the last few months. Her husband assures her it’s part of her illness, but strange memories, and a pregnancy she couldn’t possibly have conceived, says otherwise.She has two lives. Only one of them is real.
author: M.A. Dunham
